      • getNextPoint

        public Critter.Point getNextPoint​(Critter.Point currLoc,
                                  int steps,
                                  int direction)
        Gets the destination for a critter's movement
        Parameters:
        currLoc - is the current location of the critter
        steps - is the number of steps the critter wants to move (walk or run, 1 or 2)
        direction - is the direction the critter wants to move in
        Returns:
        the destination point of the critter

      • look

        protected final java.lang.String look​(int direction,
                                      boolean steps)
        Looks to see if the spot that the critter wants to move to is occupied or not
        Parameters:
        direction - is the direction that the critter wants to move in
        steps - a boolean to see if the critter is walking (false) or running (true)
        Returns:
        null if the destination is unoccupied or a string of the critter occupying the spot

      • makeCritter

        public static void makeCritter​(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                        throws InvalidCritterException
        create and initialize a Critter subclass. critter_class_name must be the unqualified name of a concrete subclass of Critter, if not, an InvalidCritterException must be thrown. (Java weirdness: Exception throwing does not work properly if the parameter has lower-case instead of upper. For example, if craig is supplied instead of Craig, an error is thrown instead of an Exception.)
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name - is the string version of the critter's Class
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException - if the class does not exist

      • getInstances

        public static java.util.List<Critter> getInstances​(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                                            throws InvalidCritterException
        Gets a list of critters of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name - is what kind of Critter is to be listed
        Returns:
        List of Critters.
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException - if the class does not exist

      • runStats

        public static void runStats​(java.util.List<Critter> critters)
        Prints out how many Critters of each type there are on the board.
        Parameters:
        critters - List of Critters.

        public static void clearWorld​()
        Clear the world of all critters, dead and alive

      • worldTimeStep

        public static void worldTimeStep​()
        Has all the critters do doTimeStep and resolve any encounters. Updates all critter states and clears the dead. Replenishes Algae.

      • displayWorld

        public static void displayWorld​()
        Prints a display of the grid world into console

      • displayGUIWorld

        protected static javafx.scene.layout.GridPane displayGUIWorld​()
        Displays the world on the UI rather than through the system console
        Returns:
        the updated gridpane
